meanings: (장애물·구멍 등에) catch, be caught, be[get] stuck (in), (기계 등에 끼이다) be[get] jammed, (발이) trip, stumble
(그물·덫 등에) (그물 등에) be[get] caught[entangled], (덫에) be trapped[entrapped]

vlive.korean: 걸렸다. He got caught. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full]ONF's SUMMER VACATION WEEK - 온앤오프 X 여름방학 스페셜위크
렉 걸렸다 렉 걸렸나? It's lagging! Is it lagging? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
우리 시간 진짜... 여기 퇴근 시간 잘못 걸렸다, 이거 지금 그렇죠? Wow... We started in the middle of rush hour didn't we? 듣기 View video TWICE : 모쯔♡
vlive.english: Wow... We started in the middle of rush hour didn't we?

vlive.korean: 걸렸다! - 걸렸다! - 뭐예요 이거? You got it! - You got it! 듣기 View video 잼플리 Jamfully : 후배한테 디스(?)당하고 역대급 폭주하고 간 우주소녀 [이세퀴] 시즌2 EP.07
vlive.english: You got it! - You got it!

vlive.korean: [휙] - 걸렸다 - 참참참! [Quick] - He lost. - Cham-cham-cham! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.69

examples.korean: It took a long time for the wounds to heal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 상처들이 치유되는 데는 오랜 시간이 걸렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It took a long time for the wounds to heal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I snagged my sweater on the wire fence. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 철사 울타리에 스웨터가 걸렸다[걸려 뜯어졌다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I snagged my sweater on the wire fence. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The car stalled and refused to start again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 차가 멎어 버리더니 다시 시동이 안 걸렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car stalled and refused to start again. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Huge waves drove the yacht onto the rocks. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 요트는 거대한 파도에 휩쓸리는 바람에 암초에 걸렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Huge waves drove the yacht onto the rocks. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It took three years to repay my student loan. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 학자금 융자를 다 갚는 데 3년이 걸렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It took three years to repay my student loan. Add to Wordbook
